taskbody.prereq: You can only add tabbed panes to a fragment or module file. The following steps assume that you have an existing fragment or module file.

step.cmd: In the DS Navigator view pane, double-click the fragment or module file in which you want to work with.

stepresult.p: The file is displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: On the Palette menu, click the Tabbed Pane widget.
In the Editor area, click the location where you want to place the widget.

stepresult.p: The tabbed pane is displayed in the Editor area.
